Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UI
A 2D/3D hybrid JavaFX implementation of UI.
